title: Hour 1: Sharp Football Analysis
description:
Warren Sharp joins us for our brand new segment: "Sharp Analysis." Warren and the crew dive into a wide array of football topics including Mike McDaniel's excellent offense, Aaron Rodgers and Justin Herbert, Geno Smith thriving, and Tyreek Hill's record breaking pace. Then, Chris Cote is back in the driver's seat and leads us to wrestling bears. Plus, Thursday Thunder is BACK!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
